text: Christian Poncelet (24 March 1928 - 11 September 2020) was a conservative French politician. He was a member of President Nicolas Sarkozy's Union for a Popular Movement (UMP).CV at Senate website . He was President of the Senate from 1998 to 2008. He was Mayor of Remiremont (Vosges) and has been the President of the General Council of Vosges. From 1979 to 1980, he was a member of the European Parliament. Poncelet was born in Blaise (now part of Vouziers) in the Ardennes. He died on 11 September 2020 in Remiremont, France at the age of 92.Christian Poncelet, ancien président du Sénat et maire de Remiremont est mort à 92 ans ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French mayors Category:Presidents of the Senate (France) Category:MEPs for France Category:Politicians from Grand Est Category:People from Ardennes Category:People from Vosges
title: Christian Poncelet
